channel.title: Flatten Array on This Site

item.title: Flatten Array in Php
item.description: following code for int type in my case. just change function appropriately when you want to change public function flattenUnique(array $array) { $return = array(); array_walk_recursive($array, function($a) use (&$return) { $return[] = intval($a); }); return array_unique( $return ); }
